name: Lovecraft's Stories
description:
An exploration into Lovecraft's stories, told through an interactive medium.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move/jump, ESC to exit to main menu

Version 1.0 - Contains first paragraph of "The Call of Cthulhu" by H.P. Lovecraft; game ends when player reaches the stone brick wall.

Created for English 53.08 at Dartmouth College
